issue.title: [CF 1447] Unit Specilaztion
issue.body:
Any plans to add unit specialization for party, this way we can control exactly what is tracked , some classes specializations have two types of kicks or different cd timers. 

 

Hunters for example have muzzle and counter shot

Druid Skull Bash and Solar Beam


> Posted by CurseForge user bambziqt | Imported from CurseForge issue #1447 | Raw

comments.body:
If Blizzard creates an API for this, I'll add support for it. The chances of them doing that is nearly zero, though.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
